season_window.notes: Second year of Wes Johnson era after 2024 Athens Regional host spot.

ballpark.name: Foley Field
ballpark.recent_upgrades: Scoreboard overhaul and pitching lab expansion targeted for winter 2024.

head_coach.name: Wes Johnson
head_coach.staff_tenure: Second season after Minnesota Twins MLB pitching coach stint.
head_coach.playing_style: Velocity-centric pitching development with on-base heavy offense.
head_coach.recent_quotes: Told DawgNation (Oct 2024) roster will ride two-way talent more in midweeks.

nil_operations.recent_initiatives: Launched 'Diamond Dawgs Society' fall 2024 for baseball-only donors with locker room access.

historical_context.program_trend: Upward trajectory after 2024 national seed; portal pitching still priority.

intel_notes.summary: Local NIL leaders gauging interest in co-branded events with Atlanta Braves minor league affiliates.
intel_notes.source_hint: Athens Banner-Herald interview with Classic City Collective director

data_quality.next_actions: Verify ops titles, populate returning starter list after fall roster release.
